body: Me and rilo kept adding resepignev to a Skype call right as a joke/troll and then me and rilo both saw him type in chat stop or I will web ban you both and we were both like how in the hell does Skype have anything to do with the avicus website correct me if I'm wrong.....

title: Does this make sense?

replies.body:
You and Rilo shouldn't have provoked him, joke or not.
He has every right to block you on Skype.

But that's as far as he can go. 
Considering Skype is not an Avicus related service, and considering that this has no relevence to the website, he cannot web ban you.

That still doesn't excuse your behaviour though.

Don't annoy people.

That still doesn't excuse your behaviour though.

Don't annoy people.

1. Who gives a f*ck who's in the wrong, it's not avicus related which means it doesn't matter in this case
2. Res prob was joking and removed it because you'd do something like this with a screenshot of the message attached.
3. Get this shit off the forums, if you're gunna report him then email support (Gl with no evidence).
